name: Escape If You Can (Room Escape challenge games)
name_original: Escape If You Can (Room Escape challenge games)
description:
Are you ready for the most uncommon room escape game you have every played?

Those undead creatures are back, and you are humanity's last hope.

Into the Dead throws you into the gruesome world of the zombie apocalypse where there are no second chances. Do what you have to in order to stay alive, keep moving as fast as you can, and protect yourself by any means necessary. When the Dead are rising, run!

• Magnificent puzzles,Stunning story
• Beautifully rendered backgrounds that will pull you in and never let you go!
• Beautiful soundtrack perfectly suited to this eerie and haunting world.
• Auto-save feature , never lose your progress again.
